video.title: Flip or Flop
video.synopsis: Spouses Tarek and Christina enter the high-stakes world of "house flipping": buying and renovating homes, then selling them for, hopefully, a profit.

episodes.synopsis: Christina and Tarek use their life savings to purchase a home and later discover that the interior of the house is a disaster zone.
episodes.title: The Foreclosure Heebie-Jeebies

episodes.synopsis: Christina and Tarek tour a house in Anaheim Hills they've been hoping to flip, only to discover it's been sacked by vandals.
episodes.title: Vandalized Foreclosure

episodes.synopsis: After bidding on a Yorba Linda, Calif., house, Christina and Tarek see that the master bedroom is situated between the front door and the kitchen.
episodes.title: Awkward Floor Plan

episodes.synopsis: After persuading an investor that a home in Garden Grove is a sure thing, Christina and Tarek discover the place is a money pit.
episodes.title: Double Trouble Flip

episodes.synopsis: Tarek and Christina find signs of water damage in a promising home in upmarket Cypress -- but they can't confirm the damage until they buy the house.
episodes.title: Underwater Flip

episodes.synopsis: Tarek and Christina take on the challenge of a 1920s Spanish-style house with unique architecture that could make this flip a real winner.
episodes.title: Spanish Style Salvage

episodes.synopsis: Tarek and Christina win a large house in Ontario, Calif., but are distressed to discover that the property's appeal is merely cosmetic.
episodes.title: Inland Empire Cosmetic Nightmare

episodes.synopsis: Christina and Tarek find that a 1920s bungalow in Whittier isn't worth their time, but an unlisted studio in the back might sweeten the deal.
episodes.title: The Bungalow Gamble

episodes.synopsis: A four-bedroom foreclosure with a pool in La Mirada turns out to be a foul-smelling nightmare in need of a complete renovation.
episodes.title: Flop House Flip

episodes.synopsis: Christina and Tarek spot a four-bedroom property with a swimming pool that needs merely cosmetic work to turn a tidy profit.
episodes.title: Facelift Flip

episodes.synopsis: Tarek and Christina set their sights on a hilltop property with a breathtaking view, but first they must get Tarek's mother to give them a loan.
episodes.title: A Flip with a View

episodes.synopsis: A five-bedroom home in Bellflower, Calif., with new renovations shows great promise -- until Tarek and Christina find a mold infestation.
episodes.title: The Moldy Mess

episodes.synopsis: A house in Fullerton, Calif., could turn a nice profit, so Tarek and Christina decide to renovate it to match the home next door.
episodes.title: Keeping Up with the Joneses
